title: Passo by Beyond
description:
• Payment Plan: 10% down, 50% during construction, 40% on handover
  • Handover: Q4 2029
  • Highlight: Direct beach access & marina facilities
  • Location: Premium Palm Jumeirah waterfront living
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 10% Anzahlung, 50% während Bauzeit, 40% bei Übergabe
  • Übergabe: Q4 2029
  • Highlight: Direkter Strandzugang & Marina-Einrichtungen
  • Lage: Premium Wasserfront auf Palm Jumeirah
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 10% avans, 50% gjatë ndërtimit, 40% në dorëzim
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2029
  • Veçori: Akses direkt në plazh dhe marina
  • Vendndodhja: Premium Palm Jumeirah pranë detit

title: Samana Hills South Phase 3
description:
• Payment Plan: 20% down, 47% during construction, 1% on handover, 32% post-handover
  • Handover: Q4 2028
  • Highlight: Affordable entry price starting 988K AED
  • Investment: High ROI potential with flexible payment plan
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 20% Anzahlung, 47% während Bauzeit, 1% bei Übergabe, 32% nach Übergabe
  • Übergabe: Q4 2028
  • Highlight: Günstiger Einstiegspreis ab 988K AED
  • Investment: Hohes ROI-Potenzial mit flexiblem Zahlungsplan
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 20% avans, 47% gjatë ndërtimit, 1% në dorëzim, 32% pas dorëzimit
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2028
  • Veçori: Çmim i përballueshëm duke filluar nga 988K AED
